bwwExcerpt: Naturally, there have been a few other character gender swaps as well: The aforementioned eligible bachelors our hero is juggling now sing "You Could Drive a Person Crazy"; it may no longer be an Andrews Sisters-style number, but the three-part harmonies are as groovy as ever. Amy-the reluctant bride who sings "Getting Married Today"-has become Jamie the reluctant groom; Matt Doyle's take on the warp-speed, tongue-twisting tune is simply marvelous.
